/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_pos_iff_of_pos (hc : 0 < c) : 0 < «expr • » c a ↔ 0 < a :=
  calc
    0 < «expr • » c a ↔ «expr • » c 0 < «expr • » c a := by rw [smul_zero]
    _ ↔ 0 < a := smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos hc

smul_nonneg:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_nonneg (hc : 0 ≤ c) (ha : 0 ≤ a) : 0 ≤ «expr • » c a :=
  calc
    (0 : M) = «expr • » c (0 : M) := (smul_zero c).symm
    _ ≤ «expr • » c a := smul_le_smul_of_nonneg ha hc
    
#align smul_nonneg smul_nonneg

theorem smul_lt_smul_of_pos : a < b → 0 < c → «expr • » c a < «expr • » c b :=
  ordered_smul.smul_lt_smul_of_pos
#align smul_lt_smul_of_pos smul_lt_smul_of_pos
smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos (hc : 0 < c) : «expr • » c a < «expr • » c b ↔ a < b :=
  ⟨fun h => lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_nonneg h hc.le, fun h => smul_lt_smul_of_pos h hc⟩
#align smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos

smul_le_smul_of_nonneg:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem smul_le_smul_of_nonneg (h₁ : a ≤ b) (h₂ : 0 ≤ c) : «expr • » c a ≤ «expr • » c b :=
  by
  rcases h₁.eq_or_lt with (rfl | hab)
  · rfl
  · rcases h₂.eq_or_lt with (rfl | hc)
    · rw [zero_smul, zero_smul]
    · exact (smul_lt_smul_of_pos hab hc).le
#align smul_le_smul_of_nonneg smul_le_smul_of_nonneg
smul_le_smul_iff_of_pos:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- Sometimes Lean fails to apply the dependent version to non-dependent functions, so we define
another instance. -/
-- Sometimes Lean fails to unify the module with the scalars, so we define another instance.
theorem smul_le_smul_iff_of_pos (hc : 0 < c) : «expr • » c a ≤ «expr • » c b ↔ a ≤ b :=
  ⟨fun h => inv_smul_smul₀ hc.ne' a ▸ inv_smul_smul₀ hc.ne' b ▸ smul_le_smul_of_nonneg h (inv_nonneg.2 hc.le), fun h =>
    smul_le_smul_of_nonneg h hc.le⟩
#align smul_le_smul_iff_of_pos smul_le_smul_iff_of_pos
monotone_smul_left:
theorem monotone_smul_left (hc : 0 ≤ c) : monotone (has_smul.smul c : M → M) := fun a b h => smul_le_smul_of_nonneg h hc
#align monotone_smul_left monotone_smul_left
mk'':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- To prove that a linear ordered monoid is an ordered module, it suffices to verify only the first
axiom of `ordered_smul`. -/
theorem ordered_smul.mk'' [OrderedSemiring 𝕜] [LinearOrderedAddCommMonoid M] [SMulWithZero 𝕜 M]
    (h : ∀ ⦃c : 𝕜⦄, 0 < c → strict_mono fun a : M => «expr • » c a) : ordered_smul 𝕜 M :=
  { smul_lt_smul_of_pos := fun a b c hab hc => h hc hab
    lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_pos := fun a b c hab hc => (h hc).lt_iff_lt.1 hab }
#align ordered_smul.mk'' ordered_smul.mk''
mk':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
-- TODO: `linear_ordered_field M → ordered_smul ℚ M`
/-- To prove that a vector space over a linear ordered field is ordered, it suffices to verify only
the first axiom of `ordered_smul`. -/
theorem ordered_smul.mk' (h : ∀ ⦃a b : M⦄ ⦃c : 𝕜⦄, a < b → 0 < c → «expr • » c a ≤ «expr • » c b) : ordered_smul 𝕜 M :=
  by
  have hlt' : ∀ ⦃a b : M⦄ ⦃c : 𝕜⦄, a < b → 0 < c → «expr • » c a < «expr • » c b :=
    by
    refine' fun a b c hab hc => (h hab hc).lt_of_ne _
    rw [ne.def, hc.ne'.is_unit.smul_left_cancel]
    exact hab.ne
  refine' { smul_lt_smul_of_pos := hlt'.. }
  intro a b c hab hc
  obtain ⟨c, rfl⟩ := hc.ne'.is_unit
  rw [← inv_smul_smul c a, ← inv_smul_smul c b]
  refine' hlt' hab (pos_of_mul_pos_right _ hc.le)
  simp only [c.mul_inv, zero_lt_one]
#align ordered_smul.mk' ordered_smul.mk'
lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_nonneg:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_nonneg (h : «expr • » c a < «expr • » c b) (hc : 0 ≤ c) : a < b :=
  hc.eq_or_lt.elim (fun hc => false.elim <| lt_irrefl (0 : M) <| by rwa [← hc, zero_smul, zero_smul] at h)
    (ordered_smul.lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_pos h)
#align lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_nonneg lt_of_smul_lt_smul_of_nonneg
lt_inv_smul_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem lt_inv_smul_iff (h : 0 < c) : a < «expr • » c⁻¹ b ↔ «expr • » c a < b :=
  by
  rw [← smul_lt_smul_iff_of_pos h, smul_inv_smul₀ h.ne']
  infer_instance
#align lt_inv_smul_iff lt_inv_smul_iff

le_inv_smul_iff:

theorem le_inv_smul_iff (h : 0 < c) : a ≤ «expr • » c⁻¹ b ↔ «expr • » c a ≤ b :=

inv_smul_lt_iff:

eq_of_smul_eq_smul_of_pos_of_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem eq_of_smul_eq_smul_of_pos_of_le (h₁ : «expr • » c a = «expr • » c b) (hc : 0 < c) (hle : a ≤ b) : a = b :=
  hle.lt_or_eq.resolve_left fun hlt => (smul_lt_smul_of_pos hlt hc).ne h₁
#align eq_of_smul_eq_smul_of_pos_of_le eq_of_smul_eq_smul_of_pos_of_le
